text: John Albert Nordberg (June 18, 1926 - March 12 2021) was an American politician and lawyer. He was a Senior United States District Judge of the United States District Court for the Northern District of Illinois. He was made a judge in 1984 by President Ronald Reagan. Nordberg was born in Evanston, Illinois. Nordberg died at his home in Glenview, Illinois on March 12, 2021 from Alzheimer's disease-related problems, aged 94.Judge John A. title: John Albert Nordberg
